description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.themes.Item.Y6wJpc2ra3bSJ905]{Biotechnician}

You know just how to ask around about your marks to gain information and insight in a hurry. You can use @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.1tzIBDaDAO4hmX5C]{Diplomacy} to @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.1tzIBDaDAO4hmX5C#gather-information]{gather information} about a specific individual in half the normal time, and you reduce the penalty for @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.UDTsEIldhXTn0VJA#follow-tracks]{following tracks} using @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.UDTsEIldhXTn0VJA]{Survival} while moving at full speed to 0.
